title: Elon Musk begins regular contact with Vladimir Putin
summary: Elon Musk began regular direct communication with Vladimir Putin while controlling critical US infrastructure through SpaceX and Starlink, creating unprecedented foreign influence over defense and communications systems.

sources.title: Elon Musk's secret talks with Putin ramped up during his Twitter takeover
Elon Musk is in 'regular contact' with Vladimir Putin, new report alleges

notes: Direct adversary contact by controller of critical defense infrastructure
